Sandals with crossover straps in braided straw and narrow wedge heels covered in imitation suede. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 7.5 cm.

Calf-length skirt in a rib knit containing glittery threads. High waist with wide elastication, and a slit at the front. Jersey underskirt.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Metal studs in various designs. Size from approx. 3 mm to 7 mm.
Calf-length skirt in patterned stretch jersey with wide elastication at the waist and a high slit at the hem.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a print motif on the front, elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Cotton linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Derby shoes in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a welt seam around the soles and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 2.5 cm.
Long metal earrings with pendants in various shapes. Length approx. 9 cm.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Sleeveless jumpsuit in an airy, patterned viscose weave with a flounce around the neckline and one shoulder and a narrow strap with a decorative tie detail on the other shoulder. Elasticated seam at the waist and pockets in the side seams.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Decorative seams at the knees, down the legs and at the hems.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Decorative seams at the knees, down the legs and at the hems.
Knee-length skirt in an airy weave with beaded embroidery, a high waist, concealed zip at the back and slit at the hem. Lined.
Sleeveless dress in slightly stretchy cotton denim with a collar, buttons at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and short butterfly sleeves with broderie anglaise. Unlined.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned, pleated weave with a small V-neck at the top and tie-top spaghetti shoulder straps. Round cut at the back, seam at the waist with a drawstring that can be pulled at the sides and a wide, voluminous skirt with a wide flounce at the hem. Asymmetric hem, longer at the back. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Scarf in a soft, airy, patterned weave.
